text:
Did Sienna Miller really turn down a date with Tom Cruise ? That’s the case according to one of this week’s new tabloids, which claims the actress rejected the movie star’s romantic advances. Gossip Cop can exclusively reveal the truth. An article in the latest issue of Star says Cruise tried wooing Miller after attending a […]
